item.title: Writing Hugo blog in Org
item.description: State “DONE” from “TODO” [2019-11-19 Tue 02:10] Heading This post will be exported ad content/posts/writing-hugo-blog-in-org-subtree-export.md. Code fragment It’s convenient in Org to insert a code fragment use key <s TAB: \\#+BEGIN_SRC latex f=ma \\#+END_SRC Math formula Inline math This is a inline math formula \(f=ma\). Online math This is a online math formula, \begin{equation} \label{eq:1} C = W\log_{2} (1+\mathrm{SNR}) \end{equation} \[ S = k_{B}T\log\Omega \] Figures With the assistance of org-download, it’s convenient to insert a figure in org file, e.
